word_mean: 支气管炎：一支或一支以上支气管的炎症

sentence.Network_cn: 她担心会得肺炎或支气管炎。

sentence.Network_en: I ended up with bronchitis and no voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果我得了支气管炎，不能说话了。

sentence.Network_en: He was suffering from chronic bronchitis.

list.abs: ...慢性阻塞性肺疾病慢性阻塞性肺疾病(Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease,COPD)，一种不可逆的慢性肺部疾病，包括两类：慢性支气管炎(chronic bronchitis)及肺气肿(emphysema)。是一种可以预防可以治疗的疾病，有一些明显的肺外效应，可加重一些患者疾病的严重程度，以不完全可逆的气流受限为特征。气流受限呈进行性加重，多与肺部.
[Key words] capillary bronchiolitis, cypertonic saline, atomizing inhalation 毛细支气管炎(Capillary bronchitis) 是一种婴幼儿较常见的急性下呼吸道感染,其病变.

entry.def: Bronchitis is an illness like a very bad cough, in which your bronchial tubes become sore and infected.

example.ex: He was in bed with bronchitis.
example.tran: 他患支气管炎卧病在床。

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of the membranes lining the bronchial tubes

sentences.en: Smoking sets up irritation in the throat and the bronchitis passages.
